incidents.description: User is getting an invalid password error when trying to log in to the portal.
The primary email server is not responding. All email services are down.

changes.justification: Firmware update includes critical security patches.
changes.implementation_plan: Follow standard server update procedure during maintenance window.

changes.short_description: Deploy new CRM application to production
changes.justification: New CRM provides enhanced features for the sales team.

problems.short_description: Recurring network outages in building B
problems.description: Users in building B are experiencing intermittent network connectivity loss, typically between 2 PM and 4 PM on weekdays.
problems.workaround: Users can switch to the guest Wi-Fi network as a temporary solution, but it has limited access to internal resources.
problems.cause: Initial investigation points to a faulty network switch on the 3rd floor of building B. Further diagnostics are needed to confirm.
